mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gold plated retractable pencil
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The pencil belonged to Robley Dunglison, first professor of medicine at The University of Virginia and Thomas Jefferson's personal physician. "Robley Dunglison MD" is inscribed in cursive. Pencil includes three intact pieces of lead.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Writing materials and instruments
Dunglison, Robley, 1798-1869
